channel.title: PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +"

item.title: Re: PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +
item.content:encoded:
ren one more thing…. turbo timer and over thruster are aquired by buying cards only????

Most cards are available only through being bought. In fact, there are only five cards in all of PW that aren't bought either with Tips or Style Points. If you're not buying cards, it is very difficult to get the Ryo coins you need for your Pizza Witch gear, since several cards increase deliciousness which determines your chance of getting said coins. (deliciousness-100)% is your chance of getting a coin from a ride.

item.title: Re: PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +
item.content:encoded: always buy cards when you have spare tips outside of buying rides and upgrading stats. it'll help you prepare for harder rides later on especially when you have to worry about a speed 21 challenge.

item.title: Re: PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +
item.content:encoded: ren one more thing…. turbo timer and over thruster are aquired by buying cards only????

item.title: Re: PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +
item.content:encoded:
EvilTaxi (Speed 5)
Turbo Timer (Speed +2) {Easy Set Super-Rare}
Over Thruster (Speed +3) (Midnight Run Super-Rare}

But wait, there's more!

See the Line (Speed +1, Speed +2 if RedEye) {Style Common}
White Witch (Speed +1) {Special}
Police Lights (Speed +1) {MajorKai Upgrade}

I'm guessing that you're going for the Made of Fire ride. Just some friendly advice, you want Speed 12+.

item.title: PizzaWitch D-speed 10 +
item.content:encoded: im stuck … i cant get my d-speed 10 + im at 7 so far … please help
